Hd 720P video calling and HD video recording
body.description: HD 720p webcam provides simple video calling on most major instant messaging applications. Built-in mic with noise reduction gives you clear conversations without annoying background noise. Even if you make a video call in dim or poorly backlit settings, the automatic light correction will intuitively adjust to produce the best possible image. Fluid Crystal technology provides smoother videos, sharper pictures, richer colors and clearer sound in real-world conditions. Instant messaging compat

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 12,424 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and install
reviews.reviewText: I use this for meetings at work and it has been great. It provides good enough quality that I look clear on camera, but not super high definition to the point where everyone can see every pore and blemish on my face. It was easy to use, just plugged it in and it worked with both MS Teams and Zoom. I like the status light on it because it makes it clear when my camera is in use. I did put a standard sliding cover over it and it stuck no problem and covers the whole lens area. The camera support is a folding assembly designed for a laptop so if your monitors don't have a flat back, it may be angled. This wasn't an issue for me, but I could see it causing some people trouble since it does not swivel from side to side, only up and down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent little camera! Just what I needed for Zoom meetings and visits with family. Very nice color and clarity - more than I expected for the price. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars With Windows 11 it WILL NOT recognize this thing. You must download Windows 10 Drivers and install.
reviews.reviewText: Likes? Once Windows "sees" it, The camera works fine. Cheap, but Logitech is reliable. It will get you by until you can afford a better one.Dislikes? If you have a thin monitor like mine, it WILL NOT Hang on. I am using tape to keep it from falling off at the moment. The cam will get you by until you can get a better one. Also, the driver issue is annoying, but... what do you expect from a cheap cam that was built waaaay before Windows 10 evolved into 11?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this specifically for zoom bibke studies with my church group. It works great and is easy to install. Mic works well and cidep looks good also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good camera
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a camera for video calls and this camera is good as well as the image isn't lag and it works good for the things I need it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective USB Plugs TWICE
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use as a basic webcam for a 3D printer. I noticed the camera would stop working relatively quickly after being plugged in. Troubleshooting led me to the problem being with the cable connection to the USB connector, as moving the cable even slightly would cause the camera to disconnect. Assuming I had just had bad luck, I asked Amazon for a replacement. It arrived today, and the replacement camera has the EXACT SAME ISSUE. Logitech's quality just isn't what it used to be. Buy another camera. This one isn't worth the hassle just for the low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best webcam for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is the best webcam you can purchase for this price other webcams have some issues but this doesn’t have any issue and picture quality is good for casual use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars very tweaky and glitchy with the movement
reviews.reviewText: It is a basic type of camera and I will get a better one in the future.

Excelente cámara con conexión usb, el cable es lo suficientemente largo, la calidad de la imagen es muy buena, la llevo usando diario por más de 1 año y ha funcionado perfecto, sin problemas para que el equipo la reconozca.
Comprei a webcam para uso profissional, com videoconferencias, e atende perfeitamente.Muito boa qualidade de imagem e áudio, fácil de instalar, fácil de usar, sem queixas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lovely item and quick delivery. Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottima webcam per qualità immagine ed audio
reviews.reviewText: La webcam restituisce un'immagine di ottima qualità. E' luminosa ed in grado di isolare decentemente l'audio della voce.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It works as expected, rather satisfied... the only issue is that it is hard to fix it. With a better grip this product would be a 5 star.
